name: player_game_prop_implied_probability_from_betting_markets
expected_query: with "t155503430bf5cf1e9aea84ca6783ae51_markets" as (select "source_id", "source_market_id", "time_type" from "prop_markets_index" where "market_type" = 'ANYTIME_TOUCHDOWN' and "time_type" = 'CLOSE' and "prop_markets_index"."year" = ${constants.current_season.year} and "source_id" = 'FANDUEL'), "t155503430bf5cf1e9aea84ca6783ae51" as (select pms.selection_pid, pms.selection_metric_line, 1 / odds_decimal as game_prop_implied_probability from "t155503430bf5cf1e9aea84ca6783ae51_markets" as "m" inner join "prop_market_selections_index" as "pms" on "pms"."source_id" = "m"."source_id" and "pms"."source_market_id" = "m"."source_market_id" and "pms"."time_type" = "m"."time_type") select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "player"."pos" AS "pos_0", "t155503430bf5cf1e9aea84ca6783ae51"."game_prop_implied_probability" AS "game_prop_implied_probability_betting_market_0", "player"."pos" from "player" left join "t155503430bf5cf1e9aea84ca6783ae51" on "t155503430bf5cf1e9aea84ca6783ae51"."selection_pid" = "player"."pid" group by player.fname, player.lname, "player"."pos", "t155503430bf5cf1e9aea84ca6783ae51"."game_prop_implied_probability", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 5 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
